argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_cnfldbas | |- CC = ( Base ` CCfld ) |
| 2 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 4 |  | #P_ringcmn | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> I e. V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> F : I --> RR ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ax-resscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 9 |  | #P_fss | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ RR C_ CC ) -> F : I --> CC ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> F : I --> CC ) |
| 11 |  | #P_ssid | |- ( F supp 0 ) C_ ( F supp 0 ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( F supp 0 ) C_ ( F supp 0 ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> F finSupp 0 ) |
| 14 | 1, 2, 5, 6, 10, 12, 13 | #P_gsumres | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( CCfld gsum ( F |` ( F supp 0 ) ) ) = ( CCfld gsum F ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_cnfldadd | |- + = ( +g ` CCfld ) |
| 16 |  | #P_df-refld | |- RRfld = ( CCfld |`s RR ) |
| 17 |  | #P_cnfldex | |- CCfld e. _V |
| 18 | 17 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> CCfld e. _V ) |
| 19 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> RR C_ CC ) |
| 20 |  | #P_0red | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> 0 e. RR ) |
| 21 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. CC ) -> x e. CC ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_addid2d | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. CC ) -> ( 0 + x ) = x ) |
| 23 | 21 | #P_addid1d | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. CC ) -> ( x + 0 ) = x ) |
| 24 | 22, 23 | #P_jca | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. CC ) -> ( ( 0 + x ) = x /\ ( x + 0 ) = x ) ) |
| 25 | 1, 15, 16, 18, 6, 19, 7, 20, 24 | #P_gsumress | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( CCfld gsum F ) = ( RRfld gsum F ) ) |
| 26 | 14, 25 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( RRfld gsum F ) = ( CCfld gsum ( F |` ( F supp 0 ) ) ) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_suppssdm | |- ( F supp 0 ) C_ dom F |
| 28 |  | #P_fdm | |- ( F : I --> RR -> dom F = I ) |
| 29 | 7, 28 | #P_syl | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> dom F = I ) |
| 30 | 27, 29 | #P_syl5sseq | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( F supp 0 ) C_ I ) |
| 31 | 7, 30 | #P_feqresmpt | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( F |` ( F supp 0 ) ) = ( x e. ( F supp 0 ) |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) |
| 32 | 31 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( CCfld gsum ( F |` ( F supp 0 ) ) ) = ( CCfld gsum ( x e. ( F supp 0 ) |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) ) |
| 33 |  | #P_id | |- ( F finSupp 0 -> F finSupp 0 ) |
| 34 | 33 | #P_fsuppimpd | |- ( F finSupp 0 -> ( F supp 0 ) e. Fin ) |
| 35 | 34 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( F supp 0 ) e. Fin ) |
| 36 |  | #P_simpl1 | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. ( F supp 0 ) ) -> F : I --> RR ) |
| 37 | 30 | #P_sselda | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. ( F supp 0 ) ) -> x e. I ) |
| 38 | 36, 37 | #P_ffvelrnd | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. ( F supp 0 ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. RR ) |
| 39 | 38 | #P_recnd | |- ( ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) /\ x e. ( F supp 0 ) ) -> ( F ` x ) e. CC ) |
| 40 | 35, 39 | #P_gsumfsum | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( CCfld gsum ( x e. ( F supp 0 ) |-> ( F ` x ) ) ) = sum_ x e. ( F supp 0 ) ( F ` x ) ) |
| 41 | 26, 32, 40 | #P_3eqtrd | |- ( ( F : I --> RR /\ F finSupp 0 /\ I e. V ) -> ( RRfld gsum F ) = sum_ x e. ( F supp 0 ) ( F ` x ) ) |
